players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice, what did you want to say? Your message got cut off."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. Diana, we must vote Alice out."
You: "Alice: Bob is lying to save himself. Why would I expose myself so blatantly on Day 1? Bob is the real threat here."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately? This timing feels suspicious."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and she is Mafia. Diana, trust me - if I were Mafia, I'd be trying to kill you at night, not expose myself with a false claim. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob

Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
